Name: 7D Game （VR for VIVE）
About the game: Essentially it will be a social game based on players' own creation, where players can make their own game rules in their own created WORLDs and share the WORLDs to everyone else to play or clear through social networking services. You can see it as a VR version Minecraft or Besiege, but more than them.
Developers: 上海游七网络科技有限公司
Publishers: 上海游七网络科技有限公司
